pages.text: 78|31|pitabrakd nasa  pheap chokchy ku samreab banda anak  del kaotakhlach a l laoh .
78|32|ku( puokke) mean chamkar damnam  ning chamkar tompeangbaychour .
78|33|ning mean sdrei prohmcheari cheachraen del mean vy smae  knea .
78|34|promteang kev del penh tow daoy sra ruoch chea se  r ch .
78|35|nowknong vea( thansuokr)  puokke minlyy peakyasaamdei del it  brayoch laey  haeyka minlyy peakyaphoutkohk der .
78|36|kuchea kar tabasnang pi mcheasa robsa anak del chea amnaoy muoy  da penhlenh .

78|37|ku mk pi mcheasa krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei ning  avei  del now rveang vea teangpir .  nih ku mk pi mcheasa mha sabborsa .  puokke( mnoussa lok) min ach niyeay avei ban laey louhtrate  mean karoanounhnhat pi trong .

78|38|now thngai del chi pril  ning mea la ai kat teanglay chhr  tam rieb cheachuor   puokke min ach niyeay avei ban laey leuklengte  anaknea del mcheasa mha sabborsa anounhnhat aoy ke  haey ke niyeay  nouv peakyasaamdei na del troemotrauv bonnaoh .

78|39|noh kuchea thngai del nung kaetlaeng yeang pitabrakd .  dau che  neah  anaknea haey chng( kech phot pi pheap lombak now thngai barlok)noh  chaur aoy ke chreusareusa kanleng vilotralb towkean mcheasa robsa ke choh .

78|40|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban dasatuen promean puok anak  nouv tearounakamm del now chit bamphot nea thngai del bokkol mnea k meultow  champoh avei del dai teangpir robsa ke ban br pru td kanlongomk .  haey anak  kmean chomnue nung niyeay tha  ao anichchea.  thveu me  d ch teub khnhom klaycha dei vinh .
79|1|a l laoh sbath nung mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit puok  del kmean chomnue daoy khorkhow .
79|2|ning mea la ai kat del dk yk chivit anak mean chomnue daoy  thnam  .
79|3|ning mea la ai kat del choh pi leumekh yeang luen .
79|4|ning mea la ai kat del d nddae m knea noam prolung anak mean chomnue  chhpaoh towkean thansuokr .
79|5|ning mea la ai kat del riebcham batobanhchea robsa a l laoh .
79|6|now thngai del( meankar phlomtre leuktimuoy) phendei ning phnom  teanglay ronhchuoy yeang khlang( avei  teangoasa trauv vineasa a nd reay) .
79|7|kar phlomtre leuk tipir kaetmeanlaeng  banteabpi leuktimuoy ( avei  teangoasa trauv rsa laengvinh) .
79|8|now thngai noh  duong chetd( robsa puok kmean chomnue) phy nheabnhr .
79|9|kevophnek robsa puokke tomleak choh daoysaar karphyokhlach .
79|10|puokke( puok kmean chomnue) niyeay tha  tae puok yeung pitchea  trauv ban ke banhchoun towkean chivit daem( robsa puok yeung) vinh ryy
79|11|tae( ke pitchea banhchoun towkean chivit daem robsa puok yeung vinh  ryy)  nowpel del puok yeung ban klaycha chhaoeng pouk phoy haey noh
79|12|puokke ban niyeay tiet tha  brasenbae dauchnaoh men noh  kuchea kar vilotralb da khatabng .
79|13|pitabrakd nasa  vea kreante chea kar phlomtre( leuk tipir)  muoy dng bonnaoh .
79|14|pelnoh srabte puokke rsa laengvinh peasapenh phendei .
79|15|rueng robsa mou sa pitchea ban mokadl anak( mou ham meat) ruochhaey  .
